alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 6:01AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTY THROUGH 630 AM CDT... At 601 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Cherry, or 17 miles southeast of Hibbing, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Eveleth around 630 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Iron Junction, Leonidas, Esquagama Lake, Murphy Lake, West Two Rivers Reservoir, Makinen and Zim. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
